title: Awesome and bad?
text: Let start with the bad and go to the good, I looked into this app a little more and many people are saying that this app tracks and scams you with them never keeping their shipping time accurate and them having very poor customer service (which they do). Now the good things, not everything in here is a scam, I got 8 items for free off this app without any catches. They were all good quality stuff (because they were all just plushies and legos) it came in early by 4 days! I think this app is great but it has its moments here and there, at the end I think it depends on where you live. Over all I think it‚Äôs a pretty great app with great deals, I will mainly just stick with Lego, plushies, clothes, keychains, pins, and etc. if your an anime lover I highly recommend this app. üòÅ

title: You Can win but they make it nearly Impossible
text: You have to invite so many people to be able to win the money they give which isn‚Äôt so much as an issue if you have a lot of friends and family who can join. Also they make you think the games you play for free money or free gifts are chance games but their rigged so you‚Äôll keep getting the same amounts each reset. So basically there‚Äôs no way you can win anything without inviting more people. And each person you invite only gives you points for the specific game link you send them. So it is legit in the sense that you Can make money. But it‚Äôs also a scam in the sense that it‚Äôs really unrealistic that everyone has to have hundreds of friends to invite for free stuff and money. It says in the rules for each game that each player gets different amounts on each game but like I said it‚Äôs rigged so there‚Äôs no way you can win first go. They make you invite people either way.

title: Very Functional!
text:
What I love about this site and app is that everything WORKS! After you place an order, you have a day or two to play with it‚Äî if you change your mind on something, you can cancel that item and they refund it immediately, and if you want to add to your order, you can do that, too, with the ‚Äúbuy with one click‚Äù option. The app keeps track of your previous orders, so you can refer back if you want to buy something again. 

The prices are amazing! Word of caution: the app is addictive! Before you know it, you‚Äôve been browsing for hours, and all those inexpensive little items add up! I would have to say, I‚Äôve been extremely happy with the quality of everything I‚Äôve ordered! Definitely 5 stars!

title: I LOVE TEMU
text: I heard about Temu during the Super Bowl when I saw a commercial. I loved the dress the girl was wearing in the commercial. When I went online to buy it, it was only seven dollars! Since then, I have probably made 20 orders and bought the most beautiful items ever. I have decorated the outside of my house with solar lights, artificial flowers inside my house, and indoor lighting to name a few. The jewelry is an expensive, but high-quality, and I find mostly everything is inexpensive and high-quality. I will continue to buy here. And if you need to make a return, they refund your money within a day, they pay for the shipping label, and certain defective items they don't even expect you to return it, but the refund is issued immediately. The best service I've ever encountered really!!

title: Do Not Use Your Primary Card Info
text: I know the owner is most likely going to delete this comment. All these 5 star reviews are false. I was recommended to use temu. I didn‚Äôt find an issue with it at first because what ever I bought actually came through to be delivered just as it was shown. One day my I went to use my debit card to get groceries and it declined. I had to leave my groceries behind, I was confused because in my bank account I had way over enough money. I called my bank and my bank told me that my card is disabled because there is some type of company attempting to steal and sell my card information from recent purchases that I had made within that week. That week I wasn‚Äôt currently buying from any other company but Temu. This is a fraud, and a lot of other people will say it is as well. Please use a cash app card or any other type of card when buying on temu, but do not use your primary card because it will try and and steal your information.

title: Very Impressed
text:
I was skeptical at first but placed an order, received the items within 10 days. Places several other orders and received them then I was hooked and placed several orders spending a couple hundred and I got crickets, orders sat for weeks without shipping. I know they got an influx of new shoppers and they have to through customs so I was patient and understanding for the first two weeks, then I got nervous. They refunded my orders promptly and said I would still receive them, I was skeptical and upset at this point but I at least got my money back. I also did in fact receive those orders. 

The items: The products are actually good quality and I have liked every item I have received so far, I have not had to return anything. 

Customer Service: The reps have been great through the nervousness I have experienced thinking I was just scammed. They did go above and beyond and always remember kindness on your part goes a long way, I was kind but they knew I was upset. 

Temu in general: I will be a fan and I hope they can work through recent hiccups and be successful. 

Thank you again for making the situation right and following through on your promise.

title: Not honest
text: First of all their gimmicks to get more people to sign up are false. I signed up for a friend. I link I got from my friend said accept the invitation and win $50. That never happened. I shopped around the app and placed 2 orders. I have not received anything yet but so far it seems legit. I did the refer 3 friends get $30 credit. It would not let me fill the last friend. It kept giving them a message saying it failed and too many people were using the coupon. So I probably won‚Äôt be using the company after I get my orders, because it seems scammy. It‚Äôs been days and the response was to start over and get more people to download the app. So basically they have no intentions of giving the $30. They just want you to keep spreading their app. And It says when your friend sends it to you you‚Äôll each get $50. Never saw that either. And nothing that they offer is actually free, you have to add so many people, etc. It says ‚Äòliterally free‚Äô but they are just false advertising.

title: Watch yourself!
text:
I got some great deals starting as a new customer. Most of the items are great for the price as long as you know what to expect. These are inexpensive items, that when carefully looked over, are full of solid deals.
Playing the games can be very frustrating to complete for free gifts, as it gets more difficult and slower as you go. All the while the games entice you into browsing and shopping for more items.
One thing I‚Äôve discovered is that items that are pulled up on discount are the same prices as what normally pulls up on my feed. 
What I‚Äôm saying is that they‚Äôre great marketers and you could spend money on thing you never really needed and you could become addicted to the deals on your feed. Enjoy and good luck.

title: Temu a great shopping experience and delightful surprises

title: Unbeatable Bargains at Your Fingertips with TEMU!
text:
Say hello to the new shopping revolution - TEMU! This app is a game changer, bringing affordability and variety together in a seamless, user-friendly interface. Dive into millions of products across numerous categories, all from third-party vendors competing to offer the best prices. It‚Äôs shopping made simple, accessible, and most importantly, fun!

From fashion to cookware, to quirky novelty items, TEMU has something for everyone. The ‚ÄòTeam Up, Price Down‚Äô mantra truly shines here - the more we buy, the more the prices drop. It‚Äôs a win-win! And the cherry on top? Big names like Lenovo have teamed up with TEMU, providing even more options at fantastic prices.

Expect shipping within 7-15 days, which is quite the deal considering the sheer range of products. And, in case something goes awry, the Purchase Protection Program is there for a worry-free shopping experience, promising full refunds for items that are damaged, missing, or not as described.

Just remember - these are bargain prices, so the quality might vary. But that‚Äôs part of the fun, right? Shopping is an adventure with TEMU. I can‚Äôt recommend it enough! Get ready to shop till you drop, without even leaving your couch!

title: I was very skeptical but I‚Äôm extremely pleased

title: Horrible shipping times!!
text: This company has horrible shipping! I placed an order and they were quick to make a label and say that it left there ‚Äúpartner facility‚Äú but USPS still hasn‚Äôt received the order to ship. This has been the only status update that I have been able to get day after day, even when communicating with Customer Service by text message. It‚Äôs been three weeks! When I contacted Customer Service by text message, they told me that they were waiting until they had more packages coming my way in order to cut down on carbon waste. And they thanked me for my patience and understanding in the matter. I asked for a refund and for the order to be canceled, only to be told the same thing all over again. They seem to have good deals on many items, however, if you don‚Äôt need them in a hurry, and this would be the place for you. Definitely don‚Äôt recommend trying to order for Christmas, or if you need it in a certain amount of time.

title: Beware
text:
Okay, so for a while (like over a year) I had used this app and loved it! I mean to the point I was ordering quite often and have loved the products for the most part. 

Then, I kept feeling like something was off and that I needed to pay attention to it more. Next, I heard from coworkers and some friends how they heard there was possible data extraction being done via card information, etc. So I really started paying attention and thought I would just buy a prepaid to use instead. 

Before I could get the prepaid card, there was suspicious activity on my bank account. Next thing I knew, my bank called because they noticed it as well. Guess what?! It happened. Someone was trying to use my card number in other states. Guess what got deleted?! This app!! 

I hate even having to write this review, but I feel you should be aware. I would like to be able to give it more stars but can‚Äôt due to this. It has happened to my coworker in an even more extreme state where they got her emails, banks, money, etc. 

If you are going to use this app, please, consider a prepaid Visa card or something that isn‚Äôt linked to bank accounts and such just to be safe and don‚Äôt store the card either. 

Again, other than this, the deals are amazing and had loved them. I‚Äôm just sad this is happening to people.

title: I Love, Love Temu!!
text: I was skeptical when I first ordered from Temu. I‚Äôve ordered a lot from over seas and always have been disappointed! But I absolutely love shopping on this app!! Free delivery?? You don‚Äôt ever get that! And 1x I accidentally ordered a couple items I didn‚Äôt mean to order. And I was credited right away. Printed the return slip sent back. Then I‚Äôve had earrings come broken. They credited my account and said keep or throw away ??? Money was in my account right away. So now I‚Äôm constantly ordering. And people are catching on. I know I pass the word about my experience!! I‚Äôm just placing another order today. I did stop texts for a bit, because they were happening to early in the morning waking us up?? But I‚Äôll put back on after vacation!!

title: BEWARE! ‚ÄúTEMU‚Äù is DANGEROUS!
text:
I would give ‚ÄúTEMU‚Äù less than ‚Äú1-star‚Äù if it were an option! They absolutely CANNOT be trusted!

-They can (and do) access any and all contents in your phone, computer, device after you download ‚Äútheir‚Äù app!

-They can (and do) make unauthorized, significant withdrawals of money from many people‚Äôs bank accounts!

-They can (and do) send the wrong items with many orders. I personally had this happen before I removed them completely from my life (I pray that I did so successfully!) Also, I did order a dress and the 1 that they sent me was WRONG.

-‚ÄúTheir‚Äù ‚Äúfactories‚Äù are based in CHINA and almost, if not exclusively, are full of FORCED laborers! Many of these are muslims who have been ‚Äúpushed into‚Äù a particular region in China.

This is why ‚ÄúTEMU‚Äù (and ‚ÄúSHEIN‚Äù) offer ridiculously cheap products!

-They ARE currently under US Congressional review! Months ago, Congress issued a preemptive warning, essentially saying, ‚Äúwe ARE reviewing them and we can already tell you that there ARE multiple issues. PROTECT yourselves from them!‚Äù

A basic Google search will reveal all of what I am stating here.

Buyer-BEWARE! I would recommend DO NOT even download their app to begin with or officially shut down your current account, making sure you specifically remove all of your credit card and contact information. And then - DELETE all traces of ‚Äúthem‚Äù from your devices!

Be careful out there!

title: Scam
text: I been using temu for a couple months, and I been doing the farmland thing to claim my ‚Äúfree‚Äù rewards/gifts, which is a pair of pants and some slides. You know how every time you get to water wheat it‚Äôs like $1 towards your free-gift? Well after I got up to 80% on the gift bar, they slowed everything down, and after I got to 90% which should‚Äôve been the last dollar I needed for my reward, they changed it down to .50 cents and making it to where now every time I water my wheat, I don‚Äôt even get a full dollar and I‚Äôve spent the last month just about everyday trying to farm it to get this lol. I‚Äôve only kept doing it to see if this is actually going to send me my stuff or waste my time. I‚Äôve been on the edge of touching the 100% since the beginning of this month and I‚Äôve barely moved because now instead of going up 10% when watering, it goes by ones and now the decimals of even that. So turning 10 waters into 20 or so more making it harder to do and get.

title: Products bought from this site
text: I have bought various products from this site. The shirts I have bought from toddlers to adults have not disappointed me. Everything I have have bought definitively is true to it‚Äôs size. The quality of the material used is comparable to higher end materials I have purchased before. The shoes because I love shoes, are true to size as well, and definitely comfortable and competitive with my named brand shoes. There bb cosmetics covers my rosacea just as good as a name brand concealer and is priced perfect for anyone. My merchandise I order comes in on time always. I will definitely recommend this site to my family and friends. I truly love the inspirational attire the site offers, and will continue to be a loyal customer.

title: Skeptical at first‚Ä¶
text: Like many, I was skeptical about trying Temu. I am very pleasantly surprised at the quality of most items and the quick delivery time. You need to clearly understand that a $.88 item won‚Äôt last forever but, I found that all of the items will well out last their price point. With that said, I was amazed at the quality of most of my purchases; make up brushes and sponges, costume jewelry, hair accessories, household items. It was so much fun to unpack my haul which consisted of 20 items for less than $20. It‚Äôs like Christmas! Bottom line, it‚Äôs legit, arrived timely, and now I‚Äôm addicted to the site! You can find so many amazing things for rock bottom prices. Just be smart, read the descriptions and reviews carefully, and try it for yourself!

title: I‚Äôm Slow to learn but well worth it
text:
I kept getting Facebook ads for Temu but I assumed it was clickbait. Then after Super Bowl my daughter said they ran and ad so I figured it was real. My first order was March 15. I opened it on my Safari and the first thing that came up was the wheel to spin for free gifts. After choosing free items I went shopping. Yippee!!!   $100+dollars later I went to checkout but then I got to the point of paying I got confused because it seemed to tell me to finish in the Temu App. So I went to App Store and downloaded. But my cart did not transfer so I had to redo cart in app. After I paid and got $30 off 1st time order and paid I realized that I did not get any of my free items and when I had opened the app the wheel did not pop up for free gifts. 

Other than that my experience with app was great

title: Great items for the money
text: I have come to love Temu. If you can wait about 10 days for your items it‚Äôs worth it. Especially on the price of the items and with free shipping even coming from across the pond.  Just like any other online shopping you have to learn to read the details of the items you want to purchase. Especially in clothing.  If I‚Äôm not real sure about an item I will usually order one of it. Then when I receive it and it‚Äôs to my satisfaction I‚Äôll order the quantity I need. But once you do that you will find it easy to order items. Temu is also really wonderful about taking care of their customers if any item is not what you expected or not as described or even damaged.  Thank you Temu!

title: Temu takes care of it‚Äôs customers!
text:
Temu has come through with me every step of the way! Great products, great shipping and returns were a breeze. 
I had some issues with drivers putting my stuff at other houses in my community. Not Temu‚Äôs direct fault but I wanted my stuff and I knew Temu sent it. They listened to the problem and took care of me. I then changed and put more info in to help drivers and since then I get my packages just fine!! Great products, great service and great customer service!
Temu I would love to get paid from you to give honest, complete and detailed reviews for customers. I enjoy taking pictures, making video‚Äôs and in general helping other people find great deals and enjoy shopping online at Temu! 
What‚Äôs not to LOVE!!

title: Can‚Äôt stay off the app
text: I love to come on here to see what they have different for me to purchase. The merchandise I received so far is good i. Quality and the turn around time is not bad at all. Most of all it keeps you up to date with tracking. I really love the promos they offer but you have to jump use them before they expire. I just learned today if you have a promo that expire you can go to customer service on app‚Ä¶ tap chat‚Ä¶ reason you contacting them is for promo‚Ä¶ your expired promos will appear and you tap which one you want to have reactivated. Downside off Temu is the games they have they want you to keep referring friends. Some people just don‚Äôt have many to refer. Other than that wonderful app I would recommend.

title: TEMU Packing
text: I like what I have received from TEMU, however, I do have a problem with how my items are shipped to me.  The package I received today was in very poor condition.  It has one big hole in the plastic bag, and another smaller one. I checked all my items, because I was actually afraid some had fallen out the larger hole.  All were there.  However, the Air Fryer liners I ordered had been folded in half in order to be crammed into the bag.  Now they‚Äôre a mess, don‚Äôt know if I can use them successfully or not, I will try to straighten them out.  I understand that the plastic bag is probably cheaper to ship for TEMU, but it leaves the items inside being too crowded.  Two of my items were in little boxes, the boxes are totally squished and beyond using as a gift box as I intended to do.  I have received 2 TEMU orders as of this review, and both packages were in much disrepair.  Today‚Äôs delivery was in the worst condition, it was really not acceptable.  Please do something about your shipping process.

title: Love it For shopping
text: Love shopping on Temu. But as for the games to play and you are supposed to be able to win free items or money. I‚Äôve been playing fishland for over two months and haven‚Äôt won once because expires before can finish feeding all my fish.  The cash reward game I swear is a scam because I get down to 1 spin left before I win and so far it never lets me get that last spin. It expires before I can.  Plus if you have $2 points left the wheel will always land on $1. Making you have to play on. Which usually can‚Äôt because not enough points to spin again. Usually expired by that time. Also you are limited to daily invites or gift picking. I know ppl claim they have won , but until I experience it myself I have my doubts. Better luck just buying the items you want.

title: I‚Äôm really liking Temu
text: Loving everything I have gotten so far with this company. I have dealt with a lot online company and have gotten screwed in so many ways, but so far Temu has not disappointed when I needed to cancel and item they refunded me righted away. The clothes are not top tier but what do you expect you for the price they are so I can‚Äôt complain o honestly like them and I get good compliments on them and they actually fit me when they arrive considering you don‚Äôt get to try them on before you buy. I just love the wide range of things they have for sale and the prices and to mention the deals. I have gotten my friends and family hook on them as well. The way the economy is right now Temu has my business for a very long time.

title: It‚Äôs like Ebay and Wish joined and made a store together
text: I‚Äôm in the US and was very skeptical, so I researched ‚Ä¶ they‚Äôre on the stock market and also they take PayPal which covers u if it was a scam ‚Ä¶ so I placed a little over $100 order and it was 9/10 days later it came ‚Ä¶ I was very pleased with the quality of everything I received considering the extremely low pricing ‚Ä¶ I have now placed another order and now that I know it‚Äôs legit I‚Äôm telling all of my friends ‚Ä¶ also my package came from New Jersey , so I‚Äôm assuming they have drop shipment places set up in the states ‚Ä¶ the variety could get better although there‚Äôs loads of things on there already ‚Ä¶ there‚Äôs still a lot they don‚Äôt have ‚Ä¶ overall though I‚Äôm very satisfied with Temu and would suggest anyone that‚Äôs skeptical to give them a chance !!

title: A Digital Maze of Madness: The 'Not-So-Super' Shopping App
text:
Oh, where do I begin with the 'Not-So-Super' Shopping App? Imagine stepping into a digital carnival, where every clown is a pop-up ad, and the prizes are just more ads. This app is the digital equivalent of a pushy salesperson who not only follows you around but also jumps in front of you at every turn with a new "amazing" deal. 

The moment you open the app, you're greeted not with products, but with a bombardment of pop-up games that seem ripped straight from a low-budget 'Price is Right'. It's like playing whack-a-mole, except every mole is screaming "Buy me!" and "Crazy discount here!" It's so relentless that I half-expected Drew Carey to pop out and ask me to spin the wheel.

Then there's the product display. Oh, the horror! It's like they've tried to cram an entire mall into a phone booth. Information, pictures, and more flashing deals are squeezed into every pixel, creating a chaotic collage that even Picasso would find baffling. Navigating through the app is like trying to read a novel through a keyhole ‚Äì it's possible, but why would you put yourself through that?

In summary, if you enjoy a shopping experience that feels like being chased by a swarm of bees while trying to read fine print, then this is the app for you. Otherwise, do what I did: delete it and enjoy the peaceful, ad-free serenity of literally any other shopping app.
